title: YAPE DROP
content: All owners of APE NFTs and all future collections will receive a percentage of sales based on the number of NFTs they own

title: New Collection

title: Token
content: Launch your own token, the proceeds of which will go to a global fund to LAUNCH YACHT CLUB AND PROMOTE it
